title: Demacian QoL
body:
Xin'Zhao, Fiora, Quinn, and Galio all do not have what a True Demacian needs. Each of them are a nightmare to walk into a bush and have the two innate passives every Demacian needs (Being in every bush ever and being immune to turret damage), but none of them have the True Demacian epicness...

DEMACIA. Yes. Screaming DEMACIA. Lux does it when she's about to explode some one, Garen does it when he's calling upon a sword from the Heavens to crush his foe, J4 screams it when he's shattering some one's skull so hard it leaves a crater around him, yet Xin, Fiora, Quinn, and Galio do not. THEY MUST SCREAM DEMACIA! It would make them all viable in ProPlay and Quinn's Ultimate would feel so right. Galio should go 'Deeeemaaaaa' when charging, then as he explodes, 'CIIIIAAAAA'. Fiora should scream it at the top of her lungs when she either hits the 4th vital or the person dies after she lands one, which is when ever the healing ends up proc'ing. 

We can ignore Sona and Vayne though since Sona doesn't speak and Vayne isn't all to... Demacian-feeling.

I DEMAND DEMACIA! Who else wants more DEMACIA? One can not survive with only three of our Demacians screaming DEMACIA.

Edit: Since a couple people have mentioned it. Poppy isn't added in since she's expecting a Sion-level rework, as seen [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule).

replies.body: {{champion:150}}  DEMAGLIOOOOOOOOO !!!!
{{champion:268}}  SHURIMA!

Quinn's joke makes fun of Garen saying "Demacia" too often, it'd feel somewhat wrong on her imo :P

Definitely on Xin and Galio tho.

Reminder: {{champion:236}} is also a Demacian. 

But I wouldn't get my hopes up since he cares more about his wife than his hometown doe.

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cjfgKNpb,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-28T00:04:21.416+0000)
>
> Reminder: {{champion:236}} is also a Demacian. 
> 
> But I wouldn't get my hopes up since he cares more about his wife than his hometown doe.

SENNNNNAAAAAAAA
He sorta does that already!

He's from Demacia, but he has no actual Demacian pride or relatively anything to do with Demacia. His weapons, his color schemes, his personality, none of it at all is Demacian at all, which is why I left him out completely. He has absolutely no ties to Demacia outside of it being his birthplace.
But his wife is dead.
Or Thailand. Cz.....y'know....Thresh needs $$ & stuff....
Need moar Demacia. Love when there's a Jarvan jungle and Garen top. So much Demacia screaming in fights.
+Lux mid
had this happen. Got locked in with j4 ult, garen spining, and lux's e. No flash grey screen in 2 seconds.

I disagree with Fiora. According to the lore, she is fighting on Summoner's Rift to restore the name of House Laurent and prove she is the best duelist. She is not there to solely fight for Demacia like Lux, Jarvan IV, and Garen are. But I think this wouldn't be a bad addition to Xin Zhao ult. That's about it though.

Fiora's house is one of the top most powerful houses of all of Demacia. While she fights in the League to restore her family name, she is doing so to prove she is a true DEMACIAN House. She is therefore very much well deserving of the DEMACIAN scream. :3

Sorry, we will just have to agree to disagree. I would put Fiora in the same boat as Vayne. 

To make an analogy, I picture Fiora as the golf champion at her school while Garen/Lux/Jarvan IV are the football team. It's more realistic to yell out your school's name after a touchdown than a hole-in-one. I don't get the Demacia pride out of Fiora, especially since she is Lux's rival.
Fiora's new kit though would have it fit so well if she screamed 'FOR DEMACIA!' as she got the healing after either killing her opponent or hitting the 4th vital. :3

She could also scream "Opa!" like she worked at a Greek restuarant. Or "Happy birthday!"

Let those that fight for Demacia (in the military) be the ones to scream "Demacia!" Fiora fights for Fiora. She just happens to be Demacian.

{{champion:114}} and {{champion:133}} are both Demacian but they aren't part of the popular kids group. Fiora is more focused on self improvement than actually fighting for Demacia and Quinn is also more of a lone wolf character with Valor. I think both of their personalities fit that well and it shouldn't be changed.

TL;DR
Fiora and Quinn are not the types of people who scream a battle cry before fighting.
Both might not be ones to scream it at the beginning, but they'd both fit quite well with it being on their finishers! AKA R's.
no :L

What? It'd be awesome to here Quinn scream 'DEMACIA' as she brings down the skystrike or Fiora scream 'FOR DEMACIA!' as she hits the 4th vital or her opponent dies after she hits one, pretty much when the healing starts.

no >:L!
Fiora doesn't fight for Demacia She just happens to be Demacian.

Fiora is part of the one of the strongest families in Demacia, looking to reclaim her fame as such and prove her family's worth after her father destroyed it! Screaming for Demacia would be amazing. :3
Fiora screams for no one >:V!
BUT SHE SHOULD.
BUT SHE WONT
{{champion:1}}  HAVE YOU SEEN MY BEAR TIBBERS
{{champion:67}} :Yes , he was arm-wrestling with volibear in Dominion , don't ask me how I know that .
I was expecting someone to say {{champion:77}}  is wearing Tibbers after skinning him but I'll take what I can get
Naw , she couldn't have BEARed the news .
lets paint {{champion:106}} brown and tell her he's Tibbers
Garen technically says Demacia! on his W and not his ult. But you didn't hear it from me.
He says it on his W or upon killing Darius.
Poppy is expecting a rework, which is why I didn't mention her. She's on a Sion-level rework though, which means she actually might just end up more Demacian than Garen!
i think shhyvana is more of ally to jarvin instead of demacia but im not sure.

BROMACIA , the country of bros
NO-xus , no xuckers allowed
Yo-nia , yooooo dude , peace
Shadow Isles , where Zed is forbidded
The Void , dimension of nopes
Tilt-over , score record on hextech pinball
Billzewater , even the water has a price
Zaun , pretty monosilabic name

forgot poppy and shyvana.

i guess they thought it wouldnt fit certain champs like fiora or lucian who are demacians but are part of the league because of personal interests. but it would definitely make sense for xin, quinn, shyvana and poppy who are there to represent their city state in a more official manner.

Poppy is being worked on for an update (Sion level, which is why we haven't heard much about it since the announcement a while back) and Shyvanna is a dragon, so it'd... be kinda hard for her. Lucian is FROM Demacia, but he's not really Demacian. He has no real ties to Demacia much like Skarner and Rammus being from Ionia, yet having very little actual ties with the outside world. Quinn, Fiora, and the like not only wear the Demacian colors, but they also fit the actual theme of Demacia. Vayne is one of the oddballs out though where she's a Demacian and is the last heir of one of the most powerful Demacian families, yet doesn't act Demacian. The rest of them all wear Demacia proudly.
Skarner and Rammus are from {{champion:268}}  SHURIMA {{champion:268}} now.

Must've missed that then! 

There is of course still Vladimir who's Noxian and from Noxus and also fights for Noxus in the League of Legends, yet Noxus didn't even want him to be in there until he murdered a number of guards first. He did join the Black Rose AFTER that though. Riven is now a wanderer who was once part of Noxus as well, but she's a defector. She'd probably be cool with a Legendary Noxian skin though.

A big one is Taric, though we've been told a million times he's getting an update. He's a Demacian as well, something that's very rarely known. As is Kayle. Both of which show absolutely no ties to where they live, much like Lucian has no ties to his birthplace.

actually one of the reason why i love jarvan,garen and lux is beacause the scream DEMACIAAAA every time XD it feels a lot more satisfying to kill someone while screaming DEMACIAAAAA!, or when you run away with 10hp screaming DEMACIAAAAAA! or simply screaming DEMACIIAAAAAAA  for no particular reason
P.S. DEMACIAAAAA!!!!
